title: Armed groups blast power plant in Syrian capital
description: DAMASCUS， June 8 (Xinhua) -- Armed groups on Friday afternoon blasted a power plant in the Syrian capital of Damascus， causing a blackout in a number of neighborhoods at the northern entrance of the city， witnesses and the state-run SANA news agency said.
cleanContent: DAMASCUS, June 8 (Xinhua) -- Armed groups on Friday afternoon blasted a power plant in the Syrian capital of Damascus, causing a blackout in a number of neighborhoods at the northern entrance of the city, witnesses and the state-run SANA news agency said.Quoting Minister of Electricity Imad Khamis, SANA said the terrorists blasted the power plant in al-Qaboun neighborhood, causing damages to four generators that feed part of Damascus. The damages are estimated at 3 million U.S. dollars.The fire caused by the blast has been put out, said SANA, adding that alternative stations will operate till the problems are fixed at the attacked power plant, expectedly within three days.																																																																								|  |
